pCollisionSettings Class Reference
[Collision]

Class for describing rigid bodies or its sub shapes collisions settings. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • int collisionGroup
    collisions group the shape belongs to

    • Range: [0,32]
    • Default: 0

  • pGroupsMask groupsMask
    128-bit mask used for collision filtering

    • Range: [0,4x4 bits]
    • Default: all off

  • float skinWidth
    Additional collisions offset

    • Range: [0,1.0f]
    • Default:0.25f
    • Can NOT altered after creation.

Detailed Description

Class for describing rigid bodies or its sub shapes collisions settings.

See also:
pRigidBody::updateCollisionSettings()
